text: Victoria Beckham returned to Los Angeles to accept the Fashion Icon Award at the People's Choice Awards on Sunday, where she dropped an amazing Spice Girls reference in her speech. The rest of the Spice Girls announced their reunion tour last week, with Beckham, 44, the sole holdout, choosing to stay focused on her fashion line. While she won't be performing with Melanie Brown ( Scary Spice ), Emma Bunton ( Baby Spice ), Melanie Chisolm ( Sporty Spice ) and Geri Halliwell ( Ginger Spice ) on the tour, that didn't stop her from referencing their breakthrough hit song Wannabe.
